verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3048>collection<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> I <S%G1299>commanded<s%> the <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>likewise.<s%>

<S%G2596>On<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> let each <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5087>save,<s%> <S%G3844>as<s%> <S%G1438>he<s%> <S%G2343><s%> <S%G5100%G99999>may<s%> <S%G2137>prosper,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3048>collections<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> made <S%G5119>when<s%> <S%G3752><s%> I <S%G2064>come.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> I <S%G3854>arrive,<s%> I will <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G1381>approve<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G1992>letters<s%> to <S%G667>carry<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> gracious <S%G5485>gift<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> it <S%G5600>is<s%> <S%G514>appropriate<s%> for me to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2504>also,<s%> they will <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I have passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I am passing <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G2443>you<s%> it <S%G2228>may<s%> be <S%G5177>that<s%> I will <S%G3887>stay,<s%> or <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3914>winter,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may <S%G4311>send<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> on my <S%G4311>journey<s%> <S%G3757>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G4198>go.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G2309>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> wish to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3938>passing,<s%> but <S%G5100>I<s%> <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G1961%G99999>stay<s%> a <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2010>permits.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> I will <S%G1961>stay<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4005>Pentecost,<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1756>effective<s%> <S%G2374>door<s%> has opened <S%G455>to<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G480>adversaries.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> without <S%G870>fear,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2038>does<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> also <S%G2532>do.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1848>let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1848>despise<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4311>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4311>forward<s%> on his journey <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me;<s%> <S%G1551>for<s%> I <S%G1551>expect<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G625>Apollos,<s%> the <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3870>I<s%> <S%G4183>strongly<s%> <S%G3870>urged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G80>brothers;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> at <S%G3843>all<s%> his <S%G2307>desire<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3568>now;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he has an <S%G2119>opportunity.<s%>
<S%G1127>Watch!<s%> Stand <S%G4739>firm<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith!<s%> Be <S%G407>courageous!<s%> Be <S%G2901>strong!<s%>
<S%G1096>Let<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>do<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>

Now I <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G5209>(you<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the first fruits of <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that they have <S%G5021>set<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1248>serve<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>),

<S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to <S%G5108>such,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4903>helps<s%> in the work <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2872>labors.<s%>

I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> at the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5415>Fortunatus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G883>Achaicus;<s%> for <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G5303>lacking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> your <S%G5216>part,<s%> <S%G3778>they<s%> <S%G378>supplied.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> they <S%G373>refreshed<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>yours.<s%> <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1921>acknowledge<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> are like <S%G3588>that.<s%>

The <S%G1577>assemblies<s%> of <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> together <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%>
This <S%G783>greeting<s%> is <S%G3972>by<s%> <S%G3972>me,<s%> Paul, with my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G5368>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> let him <S%G2277>be<s%> <S%G331>accursed.<s%> <S%G3134>Come,<s%> Lord!
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>
<S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3326>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G2881>Amen.<s%>
